result.arabic_text: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُلّٞ فِيهَآ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدۡ حَكَمَ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡعِبَادِ
result.translation: Indongozi zabo bakurikiye, zagira amanyama mu kutemera Imana Allah, zizokwigovyora ziti: “Ntidushoboye namba kubaremurura umutwaro wanyu w’ibihano vyo mu muriro, kuko twese mu vy’ukuri turi muri vyo, mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah ku butungane bwayo, Yamaze guha umwumwe wese muri twebwe ibihano bikwiranye n’ivyo yakoze”.
